title: 🛑 STOP! Don't Sign Another Lease Again! - Quick Move-in Homes
posting_body: This comfortable 5-bedroom home has no back neighbors and backs right up against a natural area and is walking distance to the trails in the nature preserve behind Bauer Landing.
You can OWN this home for less than you pay in rent!
Enjoy the country while being minutes away from everything Cypress/Fairfield has to offer!
We all dream of homeownership and LGI Homes is excited to help you qualify for a new home of your own.
If responding to ad by email please include your name, phone number, and a link to the post you are inquiring about.
*P & I. Price $377,900, 5.625% Fixed/7.084% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
